name: Server-application
tagline: This repo holds the code for server side of the HTWK Leipzig App.
body:
# Overview

* [Installation/Configuration](wiki/Installation-&-Configuration)
* [API](wiki/API---Reference)


## Getting Started
preconditions:
* installed jre
* installed maven (http://books.sonatype.com/mvnref-book/reference/installation-sect-maven-install.html)
* webbrowser (like Chrome, Firefox, ...)

## Used Frameworks
* [Spring Framework](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-framework) for WebMVC
* [Spring Security](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-security) for crypto functioniality
* [Spring Integration](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-integration) for feed and mail support
* [Java Image Scaling](https://code.google.com/p/java-image-scaling/) 
* [Apache Commons IO](https://github.com/apache/commons-io) for streams and writers
* [Apache Commons Lang](https://github.com/apache/commons-lang) for stringmanipulation
* [Google Guava](https://code.google.com/p/guava-libraries/) 
* [Google Gson Library](https://code.google.com/p/google-gson/) 
* [JSoup](https://github.com/jhy/jsoup/) for html parsing and conversion
* ...
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
